</title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=LEARNINGSYSTEMSWALES;beceed97.1501</link>   <description> Hi,<br><br>any update on the proposed meeting, would be good to catch up even if via video conf. Especially with TII and other issues.<br><br>Mark    </description>   <dc:date>2015-01-26T12:11:01+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Pelling, Mark</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=LEARNINGSYSTEMSWALES;beceed97.1501</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=LEARNINGSYSTEMSWALES;1c4425c3.1412">   <title>Jisc customer services division launches in 2015..and a personal thank you </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=LEARNINGSYSTEMSWALES;1c4425c3.1412</link>   <description> Dear Learning Systems Wales friends,<br><br>Most of you will by now have received the attached information by other routes, but I'm sending to the list to ensure that all are kept informed of changes to Jisc customer services from January 2015.<br><br>I also wanted to send a more personal note to let you know that as a result of these changes, I'm leaving Swansea University this week to take up a new home-based role in Jisc customer services, working with libraries UK-wide. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-12-22T11:48:01+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Parcell E.J.</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=LEARNINGSYSTEMSWALES;1c4425c3.1412</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=LEARNINGSYSTEMSWALES;4a9c5e.1411">   <title>FW: OER15 in Cardiff: Mainstreaming Open Education - call for abstracts E-X-T-E-N-D-E-D to 1 Dec </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=LEARNINGSYSTEMSWALES;4a9c5e.1411</link>   <description> Hi all,<br><br>I'm sending this as I know some of you are not on our other Jiscmail lists. Please encourage interested staff to submit if possible.<br><br>I am forwarding on behalf of the planning group for the OER15 Conference which is happening in Cardiff 14-15 April 2015.<br><br>Lis Parcell<br>Jisc RSC Wales<br><br>*******<br><br>Dear colleague,<br><br>OER15: Mainstreaming Open Education [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-11-26T15:56:53+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Parcell E.J.</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=LEARNINGSYSTEMSWALES;4a9c5e.1411</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=LEARNINGSYSTEMSWALES;856ece3b.1411">   <title>Re: Next meeting </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=LEARNINGSYSTEMSWALES;856ece3b.1411</link>   <description> From: Martin Lynch<br>Sent: 13 November 2014 09:30<br>To: David Lewis<br>Subject: RE: Next meeting<br><br>From: Learning Systems Wales [mailto:LEARNINGSYSTEMSWALES@JISCMAIL.AC.UK] On Behalf Of David Lewis<br>Sent: 12 November 2014 16:26<br>To: LEARNINGSYSTEMSWALES@JISCMAIL.AC.UK&lt;mailto:LEARNINGSYSTEMSWALES@JISCMAIL.AC.UK&gt;<br>Subject: Next meeting<br><br>Dear All,<br><br>Peter and I have been reminded that there hasn't been a learning systems meeting for a while, and so we've been asked to poll for sensible times and dates, and so can you please reply back to the list indicating your preference for (you can choose more than 1), and by beginning of the month I mean 1st - 15th, and by end [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-11-13T09:30:59+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Martin Lynch</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=LEARNINGSYSTEMSWALES;856ece3b.1411</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=LEARNINGSYSTEMSWALES;5c58480b.1411">   <title>Re: Next meeting </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=LEARNINGSYSTEMSWALES;5c58480b.1411</link>   <description> David,<br><br>Excellent timing - here's Cardiff Mets response<br><br>I think the meeting should be in South Wales<br><br>*<br><br>I think the meeting should be in Mid Wales<br><br>*<br><br>I think the meeting should be in North Wales<br><br>*<br><br>I think the meeting should be by videoconference<br><br>*<br><br>I don't really care where the meeting is<br><br>*<br><br>I think the meeting should be end of November [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-11-13T09:10:17+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Pelling, Mark</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=LEARNINGSYSTEMSWALES;5c58480b.1411</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=LEARNINGSYSTEMSWALES;5317fa91.1411">   <title>Re: Next meeting </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=LEARNINGSYSTEMSWALES;5317fa91.1411</link>   <description> Hi all<br><br>Happy to attend via videoconference whenever suits :)<br><br>Julia<br><br>From: Learning Systems Wales [mailto:LEARNINGSYSTEMSWALES@JISCMAIL.AC.UK] On Behalf Of David Lewis<br>Sent: 12 November 2014 16:26<br>To: LEARNINGSYSTEMSWALES@JISCMAIL.AC.UK<br>Subject: Next meeting<br><br>Dear All,<br><br>Peter and I have been reminded that there hasn't been a learning systems meeting for a while, and so we've been asked to poll for sensible times and dates, and so can you please reply back to the list indicating your preference for (you can choose more than 1), and by beginning of the month I mean 1st - 15th, and by end I mean 16th to [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-11-12T16:54:44+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Julia Ault</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=LEARNINGSYSTEMSWALES;5317fa91.1411</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=LEARNINGSYSTEMSWALES;6a089b6e.1411">   <title>Next meeting </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=LEARNINGSYSTEMSWALES;6a089b6e.1411</link>   <description> Dear All,<br><br>Peter and I have been reminded that there hasn't been a learning systems meeting for a while, and so we've been asked to poll for sensible times and dates, and so can you please reply back to the list indicating your preference for (you can choose more than 1), and by beginning of the month I mean 1st - 15th, and by end I mean 16th to 30th:<br>I think the meeting should be in South Wales [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-11-12T16:26:15+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>David Lewis</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=LEARNINGSYSTEMSWALES;6a089b6e.1411</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=LEARNINGSYSTEMSWALES;cbb7768a.1411">   <title>FW: Electronic management of assessment project: webinar </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=LEARNINGSYSTEMSWALES;cbb7768a.1411</link>   <description> Hi,<br><br>I know many of you are looking at various aspects of assessment and feedback currently. If so, you may find the following helpful and I hope a number of staff from Welsh universities will want to take advantage of the webinar.<br><br>If you wish to sign up for the TECH-ENHANCED-ASSESSMENT list you can do so directly at www.jiscmail.ac.uk/tech-enhanced-assessment&lt;http://www.jiscmail.ac.uk/tech-enhanced-assessment&gt;. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-11-04T11:00:03+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Parcell E.J.</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=LEARNINGSYSTEMSWALES;cbb7768a.1411</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=LEARNINGSYSTEMSWALES;ad0d4194.1411">   <title>CORRECTION: Call for abstracts and contributions to the OER15 conference \ufffd\ufffd\ufffdMainstreaming Open Education\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd</title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=LEARNINGSYSTEMSWALES;ad0d4194.1411</link>   <description> The email below which was sent out last week had an error in one of the URLs. The conference website for the OER15 Conference in Cardiff, 14-15 April, is confirmed as http://oer15.oerconf.org/. Please use this email when telling colleauges about the event. Thankyou!<br><br>Colleagues,<br><br>See below for details of a forthcoming conference in Cardiff which will provide an opportunity for staff and organisations in Wales to showcase work they are doing in the area of OER (Open Educational Resources) and Open Educational Practice (if you're new to these terms, you may find this a useful source http://www.jiscinfonet.ac.uk/infokits/oer/). [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-11-03T10:10:18+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Parcell E.J.</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=LEARNINGSYSTEMSWALES;ad0d4194.1411</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=LEARNINGSYSTEMSWALES;9a153001.1410">   <title>FW: Call for abstracts and contributions to the OER15 conference \ufffd\ufffd\ufffdMainstreaming Open Education\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd</title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=LEARNINGSYSTEMSWALES;9a153001.1410</link>   <description> Colleagues,<br><br>See below for details of a forthcoming conference in Cardiff which will provide an opportunity for staff and organisations in Wales to showcase work they are doing in the area of OER (Open Educational Resources) and Open Educational Practice (if you're new to these terms, you may find this a useful source http://www.jiscinfonet.ac.uk/infokits/oer/). [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-10-31T15:13:04+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Parcell E.J.</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=LEARNINGSYSTEMSWALES;9a153001.1410</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=LEARNINGSYSTEMSWALES;71adefe.1409">   <title>Remote vivas </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=LEARNINGSYSTEMSWALES;71adefe.1409</link>   <description> Afternoon all<br><br>Just a quick query to see whether anyone is involved in supporting remote PhD vivas? This could either be the candidate who is remote, or the external, or both. I'd be interested to know what software / hardware you use (for example do you use the WVN equipment, or Collaborate) and whether your institution has a policy on this. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-09-04T14:18:50+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Kate Wright [kaw]</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=LEARNINGSYSTEMSWALES;71adefe.1409</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=LEARNINGSYSTEMSWALES;2eb6794f.1408">   <title>Staff from Blackboard being given access to the list </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=LEARNINGSYSTEMSWALES;2eb6794f.1408</link>   <description> Dear All,<br><br>We have had a request from 2 newly appointed Blackboard staff to be enroled on Blackboard-Wales. This breaks our long established rule, which is that we (usually) only enrole staff working on Learning Systems in Higher Education in Wales. I wanted to get a feel from you as to whether you felt we should approve or deny their enrolements. Please feel free to reply to this message, or me or Peter directly expressing an opinion. When I have done this on other lists, we've gone to a poll, but from my experience you can roughly fall in to [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-08-12T08:30:17+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>David Lewis</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=LEARNINGSYSTEMSWALES;2eb6794f.1408</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=LEARNINGSYSTEMSWALES;afd3bcdb.1407">   <title>Re: Turnitin voting continued </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=LEARNINGSYSTEMSWALES;afd3bcdb.1407</link>   <description> Managed it via Moodle too :)<br><br>Julia<br><br>From: Learning Systems Wales [mailto:LEARNINGSYSTEMSWALES@JISCMAIL.AC.UK] On Behalf Of Kate Wright [kaw]<br>Sent: 08 July 2014 11:55<br>To: LEARNINGSYSTEMSWALES@JISCMAIL.AC.UK<br>Subject: Turnitin voting continued<br><br>Hi all<br><br>I've had a couple of emails from people saying that they aren't able to get in and vote. Ilooks like the best way to do this (without creating a separate account) is the following: [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-07-08T19:41:46+01:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Julia Ault</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=LEARNINGSYSTEMSWALES;afd3bcdb.1407</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=LEARNINGSYSTEMSWALES;d50d9a17.1407">   <title>Turnitin voting continued </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=LEARNINGSYSTEMSWALES;d50d9a17.1407</link>   <description> Hi all<br><br>I've had a couple of emails from people saying that they aren't able to get in and vote. Ilooks like the best way to do this (without creating a separate account) is the following:<br><br>Go into Blackboard and into a module that has a Turnitin assignment in it<br>Click on Course Tools &gt; TurnitinUK Assignments<br>Click on one of the assignments [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-07-08T10:55:15+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Kate Wright [kaw]</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=LEARNINGSYSTEMSWALES;d50d9a17.1407</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=LEARNINGSYSTEMSWALES;5930c171.1407">   <title>Turnitin Welsh Interface </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=LEARNINGSYSTEMSWALES;5930c171.1407</link>   <description> Morning everyone<br><br>Just a quick note to let you know that the UserVoice entry for a Welsh interface for Turnitin has now been marked as 'Funnel'<br><br>&quot;Ideas marked with the &quot;Funnel&quot; status have been reviewed and added to a larger theme (set of features) for Turnitin. These ideas are waiting for support (e.g. votes) and resources to become available before they are moved into one of the timelined statuses.&quot; [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-07-08T08:06:14+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Kate Wright [kaw]</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=LEARNINGSYSTEMSWALES;5930c171.1407</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=LEARNINGSYSTEMSWALES;8b692532.1406">   <title>Re: Turnitin in Welsh </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=LEARNINGSYSTEMSWALES;8b692532.1406</link>   <description> Hi everyone,<br>Seeing this the other day sparked a memory. This will only be relevant for Blackboard users unfortunately, and I\ufffd\ufffd\ufffdve no idea how practical this is. I also won\ufffd\ufffd\ufffdt be able to look into it much myself as I\ufffd\ufffd\ufffdve recently been seconded to another role (thanks to all for support and info over the years by the way), and you may all be completely aware of this possibility already. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-06-20T09:15:28+01:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Peter Obee</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=LEARNINGSYSTEMSWALES;8b692532.1406</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=LEARNINGSYSTEMSWALES;30986445.1406">   <title>Re: Turnitin in Welsh </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=LEARNINGSYSTEMSWALES;30986445.1406</link>   <description> Hi all<br><br>I will monitor the situation in UWTSD and keep the group informed.<br><br>We do have quite a few Schools in the university who have expressed the desire to be able to use TurnitIn through the medium of Welsh and would certainly support Bangor's efforts to persuade TurnitIn of the need for such a facility. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-06-19T15:36:26+01:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Julia Ault</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=LEARNINGSYSTEMSWALES;30986445.1406</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=LEARNINGSYSTEMSWALES;ba707626.1406">   <title>Turnitin in Welsh </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=LEARNINGSYSTEMSWALES;ba707626.1406</link>   <description> Morning all<br><br>Hope everyone is well. Val (from Bangor) and I have been working together to try and convince Turnitin of the need for a Welsh language interface. We've co-written to Sam Allen in Turnitin to raise the issue. This has now been passed to one of Turnitin's teams for further investigation. In the meantime, we have been asked to log the request through the UserVoice site. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-06-18T09:44:47+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Kate Wright [kaw]</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=LEARNINGSYSTEMSWALES;ba707626.1406</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=LEARNINGSYSTEMSWALES;cc2e147.1404">   <title>Todays LSW VideoConference 2pm </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=LEARNINGSYSTEMSWALES;cc2e147.1404</link>   <description> Hi Everyone<br><br>I just wanted to confirm todays video conference which will start at 2pm.<br><br>Rooms that I have booked into the conference call are -<br><br>USW - Tref-G506<br><br>Swansea University - ISS Room 602<br><br>Aberystwyth penglais-hol@aber.ac.uk<br><br>Cardiff University - Railway Room<br><br>If anyone would like another or different room added please let me know<br><br>Thanks<br><br>Peter Rayment<br><br>Cardiff University    </description>   <dc:date>2014-04-24T08:56:11+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Peter Rayment</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=LEARNINGSYSTEMSWALES;cc2e147.1404</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=LEARNINGSYSTEMSWALES;963988a6.1404">   <title>Re: Next meeting - a videoconference </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=LEARNINGSYSTEMSWALES;963988a6.1404</link>   <description> penglais-hol@aber.ac.uk&lt;mailto:penglais-hol@aber.ac.uk&gt; for us please, and it's free all day atm.<br><br>Thanks<br><br>Kate    </description>   <dc:date>2014-04-15T09:26:49+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Kate Wright [kaw]</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=LEARNINGSYSTEMSWALES;963988a6.1404</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=LEARNINGSYSTEMSWALES;f47266aa.1404">   <title>Re: Next meeting - a videoconference </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=LEARNINGSYSTEMSWALES;f47266aa.1404</link>   <description> David,<br><br>That is the last week of the Easter holidays (for Schools) but will ask.<br><br>Mark<br><br>From: Learning Systems Wales [mailto:LEARNINGSYSTEMSWALES@JISCMAIL.AC.UK] On Behalf Of David Lewis<br>Sent: 11 April 2014 13:33<br>To: LEARNINGSYSTEMSWALES@JISCMAIL.AC.UK<br>Subject: Next meeting - a videoconference<br><br>Dear All,<br><br>Having had our arms twisted, apologies for the short notice, but we are proposing our next meeting is videoconference on the afternoon of the 24th April. I won't be there, but if your site wishes to connect in, can you please reply to the list on this with your preferred videoconference location - it would be even more helpful [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-04-11T12:59:34+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Pelling, Mark</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=LEARNINGSYSTEMSWALES;f47266aa.1404</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=LEARNINGSYSTEMSWALES;70d5ba06.1404">   <title>Next meeting - a videoconference </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=LEARNINGSYSTEMSWALES;70d5ba06.1404</link>   <description> Dear All,<br><br>Having had our arms twisted, apologies for the short notice, but we are proposing our next meeting is videoconference on the afternoon of the 24th April. I won't be there, but if your site wishes to connect in, can you please reply to the list on this with your preferred videoconference location - it would be even more helpful if you could check that your location is free, day 1pm to 4pm.<br>Regards,<br>David<br>David J A Lewis BSc(Hons) PGCE MBA MBCS FHEA<br>Blended Learning Support manager/ Rheolwr Cefnogi Dysgu Cyfunol<br>Blended Learning Support/ Cefnogi Dysgu Cyfunol<br>IT [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-04-11T12:33:28+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>David Lewis</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=LEARNINGSYSTEMSWALES;70d5ba06.1404</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=LEARNINGSYSTEMSWALES;30982ae3.1404">   <title>Managing Change: a forum on the role of technology in Higher Education in Wales - Jisc RSC Wales event </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=LEARNINGSYSTEMSWALES;30982ae3.1404</link>   <description> Dear all,<br><br>I hope the following event will be of interest to many of you and hope to see you there!<br><br>Best wishes,<br><br>Lis<br><br>Lis Parcell<br>Jisc RSC Wales<br><br>*******<br><br>Managing Change: a forum on the role of technology in Higher Education in Wales<br><br>Wednesday, 7 May 2014 10:30 - 15:30 with coffee/registration from 10.00.<br><br>Location: Media Resource Centre&lt;http://www.mrc-wales.net/location.htm&gt;, Llandrindod Wells LD1 6AH [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-04-08T14:11:15+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Parcell E.J.</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=LEARNINGSYSTEMSWALES;30982ae3.1404</dc:identifier> </item>   </rdf:RDF>
